docs.snippet: The terrible calamity of war is probably upon us! Our special dispatches from Charleston, which we publish in the order of their reception, indicate that the authorities there have assumed the bloody responsibility, and are about to inaugurate the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The terrible calamity of war is probably upon us! Our special dispatches from Charleston, which we publish in the order of their reception, indicate that the authorities there have assumed the bloody responsibility, and are about to inaugurate the most causeless and senseless struggle against right which the world has ever witnessed. Yesterday,

docs.snippet: WENDELL PHILLIPS has been making a speech at New Bedford, on the purpose of the Administration to maintain the authority of the Government. He regards it as a truck to secure the passage of some scheme of compromise with Slavery. Here is his view of...
docs.lead_paragraph: WENDELL PHILLIPS has been making a speech at New Bedford, on the purpose of the Administration to maintain the authority of the Government. He regards it as a truck to secure the passage of some scheme of compromise with Slavery. Here is his view of the matter:

docs.snippet: Washington was thrown into the greatest state of excitement yesterday by the publication of a dispatch announcing that hostilities had actually commenced at Charleston; that a fierce battle was progressing, and that Major ANDERSON was likely soon to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Washington was thrown into the greatest state of excitement yesterday by the publication of a dispatch announcing that hostilities had actually commenced at Charleston; that a fierce battle was progressing, and that Major ANDERSON was likely soon to suffer defeat.

headline.main: FROM THE STATE CAPITAL.; Long Locks once more Trey University Loan-Nice Time in Executive Session Superintendent of the Bank Department Metropolitan Health Bill Passed the Assembly Military Appropriation Bill TheProspect of Adjournment.

docs.snippet: Mr. J. McLEOD MURPHY, made a majority report favorable to the bill appropriating $50,000 to the Troy University.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. J. McLEOD MURPHY, made a majority report favorable to the bill appropriating $50,000 to the Troy University.

headline.main: COURT OF APPEALS.; Third Week Wednesday's Minutes. Full Bench Comstock, C.J. How an "Infant" was Married, and what followed. SUPREME COURT CHAMBERS. United States District Court. Before Judge Shipman. Suit to Recover Insurance upon a Cargo of Corn. SUPERIOR COURT TRIAL TERM. Court of General Sessions. ROBBED A SAILOR. Decisions. SUPREMS COURT CHAMBERS.
The Brig Beronda in Distress.; Importations at Toronto.

docs.snippet: To create a Commission to amend the Charter of the City of New-York, and to provide for the submission of the same to the people of the City.
docs.lead_paragraph: To create a Commission to amend the Charter of the City of New-York, and to provide for the submission of the same to the people of the City.
